title: Amy Lerner (Off-road racer)
description: This week we're joined by Amy Lerner (@TeamLerner) driver for the Team Lerner Racing an off-road/adventure team. Amy (a chronic over-achiever) has jumped from wallstreet, to being a full-time mom only to end up as a prominent offroad driver in the Rallye Aicha des Gazelles. Amy tells the tale of how she went from dipping her toes into off-roading to becoming a staple in her series' of choice.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
